directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray a baking sheet with non-stick spray.
Arrange 16 Snack Factory(R) Pretzel Crisps(R) on prepared baking sheet. Top each with a piece of the popcorn chicken, a teaspoon of sauce, and a sprinkle of cheese.
Bake in preheated oven until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.
title: Pretzel Parmesan Chicken Bites
